main_definition: To take part in or be involved in an activity, event, discussion, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To actively engage or contribute to a group effort or activity
meanings_and_examples.example: She participated in the charity run by completing 5 kilometers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To join and take part in an event, competition, or discussion
meanings_and_examples.example: Many students will participate in the annual school science fair.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be a member of an activity or program, often by signing up or registering
meanings_and_examples.example: I decided to participate in the cooking class at the community center.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To help and contribute towards a group's effort or goal
meanings_and_examples.example: The volunteers will participate in organizing the event by managing various tasks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To take part as an observer rather than actively engage, typically for research or information gathering purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: He participated in a survey to provide feedback on customer service quality.
